title: SRAM GXP: An Engineering Guide
content: At the time of writing SRAM GXP has largely become obsolete and been replaced by SRAM DUB but there are a significant number of GXP cranksets still in the field and certain OEMs like TREK continue to use GXP. This guide will explain some of the quirks with the GXP standard and why fitting it […]
author: admin
